Defence: Increase the DEF for 2 turn.  Cooldown: 2 turn
Concentrate: Increase the ATK for 2 turn.  Cooldown: 3 turn
Strong Hit: Deal a unit damage 1.5 times ATK. Cooldown: 1 turn
Good Swordart: Dear all enemies damage 1.2 times ATK. Cooldown: 2 turns
Wind Field: Create a wind field that -10% for every unit. Cooldown: 2 turns
Last Stardust: -50% current hp, deal damage to a unit 4 times ATK. Cooldown: 0 turns
